Detailed Description

Definitions of memory allocator for task objects.

Define Documentation

#define CTK_TASK_MAX   (CTK_TASK_NUM_TYPES - 1)

The maximum number of the task type ID

Typedef Documentation

typedef void*(*) ctk_task_alloc_align_func_t(int obj_type, size_t size, int align)

Aligned memory allocator function type for task modules (Takes task object type, memory size to allocate and align size. Returns the allocated pointer)

typedef void*(*) ctk_task_alloc_func_t(int obj_type, size_t size)

Memory allocator function type for task modules (Takes task object type and memory size to allocate, and returns the allocated pointer)

typedef void(*) ctk_task_free_align_func_t(void *ptr)

Aligned memory free function type for task modules (Takes memory pointer and frees it)

typedef void(*) ctk_task_free_func_t(void *ptr)

Memory free function type for task modules (Takes memory pointer and frees it)

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
CTK_TASK_OBJECT  Task object type - Any type
CTK_TASK_TASK  Task object type - SPE task
CTK_TASK_RUNTIME  Task object type - runtime

Function Documentation

ctk_task_alloc_align_func_t ctk_task_get_alloc_align_func (  ) 

Returns the current aligned-memory allocator for task objects.

Returns:
the current memory allocator

ctk_task_alloc_func_t ctk_task_get_alloc_func (  ) 

Returns the current memory allocator for task objects (e.g., mutex, semaphore).

Returns:
the current memory allocator

ctk_task_free_align_func_t ctk_task_get_free_align_func (  ) 

Returns the current aligned-memory free_func for task objects.

Returns:
the current memory free_func

ctk_task_free_func_t ctk_task_get_free_func (  ) 

Returns the current memory free_func for task objects.

Returns:
the current memory free_func

ctk_task_alloc_align_func_t ctk_task_set_alloc_align_func ( ctk_task_alloc_align_func_t  allocator  ) 

Sets a new aligned-memory allocator for task objects. The allocator routine should be of ctk_task_alloc_align_func_t.

Parameters:
[in] allocator - the new memory allocator
Returns:
the old memory allocator

ctk_task_alloc_func_t ctk_task_set_alloc_func ( ctk_task_alloc_func_t  allocator  ) 

Sets a new memory allocator for task objects (e.g., hash, thread, etc.). The allocator routine should be of ctk_task_alloc_func_t, i.e., takes two params task_type and size and returns a pointer to the allocated region.

Parameters:
[in] allocator - the new memory allocator
Returns:
the old memory allocator

ctk_task_free_align_func_t ctk_task_set_free_align_func ( ctk_task_free_align_func_t  free_func  ) 

Sets a new aligned memory free_func for task objects. The free_func routine should be of ctk_task_free_align_func_t.

Parameters:
[in] free_func - the new memory free_func
Returns:
the old memory free_func

ctk_task_free_func_t ctk_task_set_free_func ( ctk_task_free_func_t  free_func  ) 

Sets a new memory free_func for task objects. The free_func routine should be of ctk_task_free_func_t, i.e., takes two params task_type and size and returns a pointer to the freeated region.

Parameters:
[in] free_func - the new memory free_func
Returns:
the old memory free_func

Variable Documentation

ctk_task_alloc_func_t ctk_task_alloc

A memory allocator for task objects; you can change the default memory allocator by ctk_task_set_alloc_func.

ctk_task_alloc_align_func_t ctk_task_alloc_align

An aligned memory allocator for task objects; you can change the default memory allocator by ctk_task_set_alloc_align_func.

ctk_task_free_func_t ctk_task_free

A memory free function for task objects; you can change the default memory free routine by ctk_task_set_free_func.

ctk_task_free_align_func_t ctk_task_free_align

An aligned memory free function for task objects; you can change the default memory free routine by ctk_task_set_free_align_func.
